hooks.prompt: Before completing this session, check if any source code files (.java, .kt, .gradle) were modified. If so, remind the user to verify documentation is up-to-date. Check for: 1) README.md examples match current API, 2) Configuration properties documented, 3) New features have docs. Respond with JSON: {"decision": "approve", "reason": "Documentation reminder provided if applicable"}

If a documentation file (.md) was just written or edited, verify it follows SimpliX documentation guidelines: 1) No emojis (only symbols allowed), 2) No hardcoded versions, 3) Required sections present. Respond with JSON: {"decision": "allow", "reason": "Documentation guidelines check passed or N/A"}
